Html:
Hey all,  I am in the process and near completion of a conversion of nerd dinner to PHP to be hosted on Azure.  This is going to be a demo app to show PHP Applications running on Azure.  I was planning to utilize the same style for the site including images, but before I did I wanted to make sure that was fine.  I am leaving the attribution to the designer.

Thanks.

I think I'd prefer that it look different. Thanks.

On Wed, Aug 5, 2009 at 3:51 PM, larryb <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: larryb
